title: War in Korea
description: OUR COPY HAS BEEN WELL USED AND WELL READ. SCUFFING, EDGE WEAR, AND SOME CURLING AT EDGE OF COVERS. SOME DINGS AND DISCOLORATION ON BOARDS.. BINDING HAS SPLIT INSIDE FRONT COVER, BUT ALL PAGES REMAIN TIGHTLY BOUND. CHIPPING ON A FEW PAGES AS WELL AS AGE RELATED TANNING & SOME DISCOLORATION. NO MARKING OR WRITING NOTED WITHIN BOOK. GREAT READING COPY!
author: Robert Leckie
